Id3Lib (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/id3lib/id3lib-3.8.3.zip

Bug correction

  • In %SOURCE_HOME%/src/misc_support.cpp, modify:
    //#include <ctype.h>
    --> 
    #include <ctype.h>
  • In %SOURCE_HOME%/include/id3/utils.h, modify:
    #include <config.h>
    --> 
    #include <id3/config.h>

Project

  • Create new project (Library)
  • Add (%SOURCE_HOME%/src/): All .cpp files except c_wrapper.cpp

Project Options

  • Compiler : Release
  • TLib, Page size : 0x0020
  • C++, Exception handling : Disable all
  • Directories, include : add %SOURCE_HOME%/
  • Directories, Conditional : _WIN32;WIN32

Compile

  • Ctrl+F9

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/id3/ to Shared/Include/id3/
  • Copy %Your_Project_Name%.lib to Shared/Library/BCB/Id3Lib.lib
  • Don't use zlib.lib (too old)
